about_the_game:
Introducing "Challenge #1," a heart-pounding hardcore platformer that will test your skills, reflexes, and determination. Dive into a relentless world of precision and timing, where every jump and obstacle is a formidable trial.

Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey through meticulously designed levels that push the boundaries of platform gaming. Challenge #1 is not for the faint of heart – it's a true test of your platforming prowess. With each level more demanding than the last.

Immerse yourself in a visually stunning environment with Unreal Engine 5 graphics. Master the art of precision jumping, hone your reflexes, and conquer challenging platform sequences to emerge victorious.

Key Features:

- Hardcore Platforming: Face a relentless series of challenging levels that will push your platforming skills to the limit.
- Precision Gameplay: Navigate through intricate obstacles with pixel-perfect precision.
- Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in a visually striking world, brought to life with meticulous attention to detail.

Challenge #1 is not just a game; it's a gauntlet thrown down to all hardcore platforming enthusiasts. Do you have what it takes to conquer the challenge? Take on the ultimate test of skill and reflexes – download Challenge #1 now and prove you're the platforming champion!

Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey through meticulously designed levels that push the boundaries of platform gaming. Challenge #1 is not for the faint of heart – it's a true test of your platforming prowess. With each level more demanding than the last.

name: Challenge N°1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: The hardest platform game ever. Climb to the top before you drown
